## Hash.finish() method

Get the current hash value as a 32-bit integer.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
abstract finish(): number;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

number

## Remarks

The method is limited to 32-bit integers as this is the limit of bitwise operations in JavaScript.
